channel.title: Technial Support
channel.description: If Eon is causing you grief, discuss it here and we'll help sort it out.

item.title: how aniamtion merge in level maps
item.author: invalid@example.com (mani_199)
item.dc:creator: mani_199
item.content:encoded:
hi
i made one loop animation in 3dstudio max . so i exported animaiton in
ut animation browser through actor x plugin (.psk and .psa ) . i want that how that animation goes to in ut level maps

if no one have answer then please told me exact fourm where i could find help

item.title: Can't load game! HELP!
item.author: invalid@example.com (-C-)
item.dc:creator: -C-
item.content:encoded: I really want to try out this mod because it looks sweet. But when I go to "Play", and I click start, it takes me back to the main menu! Help me please! I really want to play this game! Please help!

item.title: KritiKal Error on Start-Up
item.author: invalid@example.com (KritiKalMass)
item.dc:creator: KritiKalMass
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I'm having a little trouble getting the Alpha 0.1 to run.
When I double-click on PlayEon.bat, I get the following critical error:

UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2004-03-03_02.42]

OS: Windows 98 4.10 (Build: 67766446)
CPU: AuthenticAMD PentiumPro-class processor @ 2079 MHz with 511MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce4 Ti 4800 SE (6176)

General protection fault!

History: UObject:rocessEvent <- (EonPC_Base EonLogo.EonPC_Base, Function EonEngine.EonPC_Base.PostBeginPlay) <-...

KritiKal Error on Start-Up

item.title: Can't get it to work...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neo65)
item.dc:creator: Neo65
item.content:encoded: When I click start it brings me back to the title screen...

item.title: Error when loading the mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (darkhack)
item.dc:creator: darkhack
item.content:encoded:
Hi I receive this "Critical Error" when loading the PlayEon.bat file:

UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2004-03-03_02.42]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 2396 MHz with 254MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9000 SERIES (6476)

General protection fault!

History: UObject:rocessEvent <- (EonPC_Base EonLogo.EonPC_Base, Function EonEngine.EonPC_Base.PostBeginPlay) <- ULevel::SpawnActor <- (EonPC_Base) <- UObject:rocessEvent <- (EonGI_Base...

Error when loading the mod

item.title: Sun Field starts and just freezes on me
item.author: invalid@example.com (seedub-)
item.dc:creator: seedub-
item.content:encoded: Any way to dumb down the gfx? Seems like it just starts and the frames go to mud. This game is looking awesome from what I can see so far, would love to get this module working. Thanks.

item.title: Technical Support
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Eon Technical Support discussion forum.

If you are having difficulty running Eon we're here to help answer your questions and get you off and running.
